books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The third book in the Archer series. Archer, Dash and Callahan search for a missing screenwriter who had a dead body turn up in her home.
books.name: DREAM TOWN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A supermodel deals with the effects of a terror attack at an airport in Brussels on her life and appearance.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: The 16th book in the Sigma Force series. An unknown force is putting people in a catatonic state in a village in the Congo.
books.name: KINGDOM OF BONES

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by James Patterson and J.D. Barker
books.description: Detective Walter O’Brien is obsessed with an escape artist who bludgeoned her kidnapper and avoided police custody.
books.name: DEATH OF THE BLACK WIDOW

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Letty Davenport, the adopted daughter of Lucas Davenport, looks into oil thefts in Texas.
books.name: THE INVESTIGATOR

books.author: by Dolly Parton and James Patterson
books.description: A singer-songwriter goes to Nashville seeking stardom but is followed by her dark past.
books.name: RUN, ROSE, RUN

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Emily St. John Mandel
books.description: A detective investigating in the wilderness discovers that his actions might affect the timeline of the universe.
books.name: SEA OF TRANQUILITY

books.author: by Abby Jimenez
books.description: A city doctor must choose between her family’s wishes of becoming a world-renowned surgeon or having a life with a ridiculously hot carpenter.
books.name: PART OF YOUR WORLD

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s neighbors when he goes missing.
books.name: THE PARIS APARTMENT

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A brush with members of a drug-trafficking organization ushers a suburban family to go into the witness protection program.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED TO THE BENNETTS
